name: Dongtube Api'S
description: Simple and easy to use API documentation.

items.name: LuminAI
items.desc: Advanced AI assistant powered by LuminAI for intelligent conversations

params.text: Text message for the AI to respond to

items.name: Blue Archive
items.desc: Get random high-quality Blue Archive character images

items.name: Random Waifu
items.desc: Get random waifu images from waifu.pics (supports both GET and POST methods)

items.name: Random Cat
items.desc: Get random cat images from external API (supports both GET and POST methods)

items.name: Random Anime Neko
items.desc: Get random anime neko images from waifu.pics (supports both GET and POST methods)

items.name: Anime Quotes
items.desc: Get random anime quotes with character and anime information (supports both GET and POST methods)

items.name: BRAT Generator
items.desc: Generate BRAT-style text images with customizable colors and backgrounds

params.text: Text to be inserted into the BRAT image (required)

items.name: BRAT Video Generator
items.desc: Generate animated BRAT-style text videos with customizable colors and backgrounds

params.text: Text to be inserted into the BRAT video (required)

items.name: Image Upscaler
items.desc: Upscale/enhance images using PicsArt AI enhancement service. Supports both URL input (GET) and file upload (POST) methods.

params.url: Image URL to upscale (for GET method)

items.name: TikTok Downloader
items.desc: Download TikTok videos and slideshows without watermark. Supports both GET (query parameter) and POST (JSON body) methods.

items.name: SaveFrom Downloader
items.desc: All-in-One downloader for media from YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok, and more. Supports video, audio, and image downloads with filtering by media type.

params.type: Filter by media type: video, audio, or image (optional)

items.name: Pinterest Downloader
items.desc: Download images, videos, and GIFs from Pinterest. Supports all Pinterest domains and short URLs with detailed metadata.

text: Text message for the AI to respond to

items.name: Blue Archive
items.desc: Get random high-quality Blue Archive character images

items.name: BRAT Generator
items.desc: Generate BRAT-style text images with customizable colors and backgrounds

params.text: Text to be inserted into the BRAT image (required)

items.name: BRAT Video Generator
items.desc: Generate animated BRAT-style text videos with customizable colors and backgrounds

params.text: Text to be inserted into the BRAT video (required)
